title: Experience-Based Job Competency Development: Field-Applied Microlearning in Science

context.prior_knowledge: Core scientific theories and three or more years of fieldwork experience
context.additional_context: Analyzing science-related job experiences through a phenomenological approach to establish competency development strategies

learning_goals: Learners can systematically classify tacit knowledge acquired from field experiences into three or more scientific frameworks
Learners can diagnose problem cases arising during peer collaboration using phenomenological analysis techniques and propose improvement strategies
Learners can design two or more experience-based competency development strategies through case-based simulations provided on mobile learning platforms
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
